description:
Zoom in on that next ridge, cross that illusive hawk off your life-list, or get a little closer to the next big game. The compact design fits nicely nearly anywhere, from your pack to your glovebox.

  • Slip resistant rubberized armor
  • Roof-prism construction reduces weight and bulk
  • Single coated optics allow max light transmission with minimal internal glare and flare
  • Centre focus wheel provides quick and precise adjustments
  • Insta-Focus® for quick focus on moving targets
  • Includes soft carrying case, protective caps, neck strap, and lens cleaning cloth
name: Bushnell Powerview 8x21 Binoculars
